name: simple cozy felted slippers
notes:
**beginner-friendly, stress-free felted slippers worked flat and in the round.**

suggested yarn: 100% wool suitable for felting (non-superwash). bulky or aran weight wool works best.

even if your gauge is a bit off, your tension isn’t perfect, or your stitches look a little wonky — don’t stress! felting evens everything out and shapes the slippers beautifully.

trust the process, enjoy the knitting, and let the washing machine do the magic!
